ch.usi.inf.lidr.examples
Class FileExample

java.lang.Object
  ch.usi.inf.lidr.examples.FileExample

public final class FileExample
extends Object

An example of LiDR usage, when CSI and source-specific retrieval results are stored in TREC-formatted files.

Author:
Ilya Markov

          The score normalization method.

          The resource selection method.

          Returns a mapping between CSI documents and their corresponding resources.
private static List<Resource> getResources()
          Returns a list of resources (assumes that there are 4 resources with ids from 1 to 4).

Constructor Detail

FileExample

public FileExample(ResourceSelection selection,
                   ScoreNormalization normalization)
Constructs the example.

Parameters:
selection - The resource selection method.
normalization - The score normalization method.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if selection or normalization is null.
Method Detail

main

public static void main(String[] args)
The main executable method.

Parameters:
args - The external parameters of the method.

printUsage

private static void printUsage()
Outputs the instructions.

getResources

private static List<Resource> getResources()
Returns a list of resources (assumes that there are 4 resources with ids from 1 to 4). The resource and sample sizes are generated randomly (for example purpose only!).

getResourceSearchers

private static Map<Resource,FileSearcher> getResourceSearchers(List<Resource> resources,
                                                               String resultsDir)
Returns a mapping between resources and their searchers. Assumes that for a given resource its TREC-formatted results file, located in resultsDir, has a name equal to resource id.

getDoc2Resource

private static Map<String,Resource> getDoc2Resource(File doc2resourceFile,
                                                    List<Resource> resources)
Returns a mapping between CSI documents and their corresponding resources.

run

public void run(FileSearcher csiSearcher,
                Map<Resource,FileSearcher> resourceSearchers,
                Map<String,Resource> doc2resource)
Runs the example.

Parameters:
csiSearcher - The CSI searcher.
resourceSearchers - The mapping between resources and their corresponding searchers.
doc2resource - The mapping between CSI documents and their corresponding resources.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if csiSearcher, or resourceSearchers, or doc2resource is null.

getResources

private List<Resource> getResources(List<ScoredEntity<String>> documents,
                                    Map<String,Resource> doc2resource)
For a given list of documents returns a list of their corresponding resources.
